titles.title: Tax Education & Accountability Act
TEA Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the withholding of income taxes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/29/2010--Introduced. Tax Education & Accountability Act or the TEA Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the withholding of income tax. Makes such repeal effective on or after the first January 1 occurring 1 year after the enactment of this Act.
